title: So good!
text: A really lovely, casual place for super yummy cocktails, and the waiters were so chatty and lovely! 10/10 would recommend if you’re looking for somewhere nice for cocktails

title: So cool!
text: Amazing views and Acropolis itself is so impressive! There are a lot of stairs though so may not be accessible to all

title: Amazing!!
text: Absolutely incredible food, the best we ate in Athens! Staff were super friendly and welcoming. Very good value for money!!
